episodes.title: Wow! I Was In a Frickin Cult!  Here's How I Know.  Ex-Member of WWCG and JW - This is for Us!
episodes.description:
We often wonder when we get out of an organization if we really truly were in a cult.  We think of Jim Jones, David Koresh,  James Manson, etc. where people got killed for thinking they were following God through this man.  Well, there are signs of a cult which we've gathered in here as well as the definition of a cult.  It's all very interesting.  After reading through these, we take the time to examine our cult next to the "the list".  We're able to give a definitive answer after reading back through the list at the end.  OMG!

episodes.title: Was I REALLY in a "Freakin" Cult?  Meet Melina Oien Who Has Figured Some Stuff Out!  Powerful! Wow!
episodes.description:
After her Sisters' Suicide - everything began to change for Melina and her family which lead to massive struggle and painful family changes at around age 14.  Eventually, with serious health challenges for her daughter and herself, Melina reached rock bottom and had no choice but to draw a line in the sand and reach out for help from "the world" who saved her life from our perspective!  She did the deep dives and after 3 years was willing to talk about "the cult" and face the deeper "scary stuff" that brought so much trauma and pain, PTSD and an Auto Immune Condition which was at was at the root of everything.  Amazing Woman, Amazing Story!

Mentioned in Show:  The Body Keeps Score
Saying:  Shame Lives in Silence (and is the silent killer Dan says)

episodes.title: Part 2/Medical Neglect Gone Mad! Letting People Die Unnecessarily? No Medication? w/Sara Ahrenholtz
episodes.description:
People dying unnecessarily due to fear of obtaining medical help even if it was serious - fear of not making it into the Kingdom for lack of faith or disobedience to the law as interpreted by men (pedophiles even).  Oh My Goodness!  The stories you will hear in here!  Did you experience similar?  People not getting help with Cancer to their dying day.  Sara losing her friend Kelly to cancer at age 9!!! but standing firm by her faith to her dying day, perhaps wanting to please her parents.  Poor thing!  Were these pastors who guilted them when they mentioned the possibility of getting help also responsible for murder? Keeping them from getting medical help - like the Jehovah's Witnesses who couldn't take blood (with a person assigned to make sure they didn't at the hospital)?

episodes.title: Interview with Gayle Markley - Former Member - WWCG  - Still Has Good Memories but Struggling
episodes.description:
Gayle shares her struggle with balancing the fact that she grew in a cult and the fact that her parents were good people who were just doing the best they could and not wanting to give them a bad name in any way.  A real struggle inside to not be in denial and give credit where credit is due.

episodes.title: Sara Ahrenholtz - SPEAKS OUT After Coming Out of a CULT - Worldwide Church of God - For First Time!
episodes.description:
EPISODE 1 - Coming Out of Denial After Coming Out of a Cult is Step 1.  Being Honest About What Was Experienced is probably Step 2. Then being validated, often through counseling of some sort is very key and probably Step 3.  From there, healing can ensue as we continue to let go of the fear, the guilt, the lies, etc.  Sara tells about what it was like living under the heavy duty control in this mind bending, law driven, fear intense abusive cult. Dan and Angela (who was once in this cult) host the show and this is just the beginning, this being Episode 1 with Sara Ahrenholtz.  More to Come! 

Angela Clark is an Empower Her Life Coach.  If you need to be uplifted or encouraged, schedule an appointment today!  Go to:  https://www.AngelasInspirations.com and then to Coach Tab or email her at exworldwidetruthseekers@gmail.com

episodes.title: Perfectionism Sufferers - There is Hope for Us!  Listen: "I Love You Just the Way You Are"
episodes.description:
In this video, I will give you an arsenal of tools to overcome and how to see this differently. What we were taught growing up (usually from religion) that we're never good enough and will never measure up either.  That God will never be happy with us.  When we think we've got a handle on a weakness and manage to pat ourselves on the back, the next day - a solid setback.  Another failure - I failed myself, I failed God.

episodes.title: Am I Killing Myself with My Hate Thoughts Towards the World?
episodes.description:
We can get sour and resentful within ourselves when life and the world doesn't give us what we think we deserve.  Many of us were taught in our religions that the world is an unsafe place and is bad and a depressing place to be in.  We need to change our mind about this so we can function in this world in a way that supports what we are here on earth to do - not just waiting for it to end.  We see everyone as separate from us.  We have to learn to love our neighbor as we love ourselves which IS loving ourselves.  Dr. David R. Hawkins teaches about what happens when our thoughts and vibrations (negative or positive) affects our body, our health and our feeling that life is good or not good.  So we want to strive to be in the flow with God type thoughts - Joy, hopeful, optimistic, peace, harmony, etc.

episodes.title: Men Have an Ancestral Heart Wounding (Don't Cry) Woman to the Sacral Area (abdomen).How to Fix This?
episodes.description:
Angela and Dan Clark discuss how men have not been in their hearts due to long time ancestral programming being told that they are never to show emotion, never to cryand woman have received the same wounding but to the sacral area (abdomen) which we need to acknowledge so that healing can begin.  Men need to be able to open their hearts again and not be afraid to be emotional, cry, be sensitive. Women have been told to not be strong, courageous or bold - but encouraged to be weak with no voice but check out the Proverbs 31 woman. She wasn't at all weak or quiet!.  Both need to come to the middle so that we are balanced.  A Balanced Man, a Whole Woman

episodes.title: Time to Use Our Voices.  It's What We're All Here to Learn
episodes.description:
We've all experienced abuse of all kinds and much suffering all for a reason.  We are meant to eventually be fed up with injustice and corruption and stand up - all of us.  Or not.  We can continue to suffer.  But I'm Telling You - We are meant to use it (our past suffering) for good.  Now is that time.  I hope we all begin to speak out for not just ourselves, but for our neighbor, the poor, the widow, the depressed, the mentally ill, the sick and "do unto others as we would have them do to us". And Jesus said, "as you've done it unto the least of these, you've done it unto me".  That's pretty amazing!  we've been through all that we have for "such a time as this".  I know we can do it!

www.angelasinspirations.com
Facebook:  Ex-Worldwide Truth Seekers
Facebook:  Life After Religion

episodes.title: Angela Visits a UCG (Former WWCG) Meeting - First Time in 15 Years   No Thanks!
episodes.description: I wanted to see what it feels like now after not having been for 15 years and that last visit was my first time in longer than that.  I am so glad to be out!  I share the attitudes, same old fear tactics, patriarchal control over women and members, depression, severe judgement and distain, hypocrisy, lying and more!  I'll also give a sneak peak about what is going on in the Old Big Sandy Campus in Texas and the Church of God Church and UCG church on the edge of it on either side.  Interesting!  Shocking!  What is going on!!!

episodes.title: A Different Way of Seeing Christmas & Overcoming Some of the Guilt & Fear of the Season for Ex-WWCG
episodes.description: Sorting Out How We Feel About This Season is Not Easy With Soooo Much Programming About This Holiday.  Let's Really Look at It Though with a Fresh Perspective.  We'll Share How We've Been Able to Process it to This Point and Maybe Help You Sort Out Just How to Deal with This Holiday Season and Relatives and Co-Workers too.  Here's WIshing You a Peaceful Holiday Season!  Dan and Angela Clark

episodes.title: How to Overcome the "Stuffing  It Down"  of Years and  How to Deal with the Silent Treatment
episodes.description: Growing up in Worldwide left us without some of the basic tools of communicating properly in our relationships and due to how we were raised - we learned to stuff everything since were weren't allowed to say what hurt.  In fact - children were to be seen and not heard and were valueless as well as women.  But we can overcome this and take back the control of not only our emotions but our very lives and find some real freedom, learning how to be authentic and easily deal with the dysfunction.  But first, we have to see the dysfunctional in our families for what it is.  We have to overcome the abuse and call it what it was.

episodes.title: Do You Want Relationships That Are Lasting & Satisfying? We'll Share With You Some Powerful Secrets!
episodes.description: Dan and Angela discuss what it takes to have relationships that are satisfying and successful - so that everyone wins and life feels good.  When we were in Worldwide Church of God we didn't learn these important tools.  We were living in toxic and unhealthy relationships everywhere we went.  We left not feeling like we fit in in this world and not knowing how to function.  We knew we lacked something - but what?  We use real examples to make our point.  We're honest and real.

episodes.title: Here's How I Got Out!  Betrayal Hurts! Loving My New Life Now!
episodes.description: Angela Clark shares her Moment of Betrayal By the Church and How She Decided to Move On.  Tells Her Story of Facing that She Was in A Cult by a Small Town Pastor. Sharing the Tools that Helped Her and Shares Her Story of Overcoming the Cult.  Check our her website too:  Ex-WorldwideTruth Seekers.com

episodes.title: WELCOME to Ex-Worldwide Truth Seekers - Cult Recovery
episodes.description:
Feeling Overwhelmed, Lost, Angry - Not Even Sure What's Wrong?  
I Started This Site Because I Couldn't Find Any Help Out There That Worked for Me.  I'm DEFINITELY OUT of the Box and Always Searching.  We're going to explore our thoughts & feelings looking outside the box and with Our Eyes Wide Open - Being Raw and Honest About our True Feelings - Facing Them and Looking at Things from Various Angles. We Heal as We Share and Get it Out.  But I Don't Want to Act Like We're Still in There Re-hashing and Re-Shaping Old Beliefs So As to Keep Them in a Revised Fashion.  We're Out!  Please Help This Community to Heal by Sharing Good Videos that Have Helped You and Let's Continue to Become our Best Selves - Shedding the Old Beliefs and Accepting Some New Ones!  Welcome!   

Check Out my Husbands Facebook and You Tube Page for Ex-JW's:  Life After Religion
Check Out My Facebook Page:  The Art of Healthy Relationships
My Website:  AngelasInspirations.com 
Dan's Site:  MyProdigalJourney.com
